body.name: CB CHROMEBATTERY YT12B-BS High Performance - Maintenance Free - Sealed AGM Motorcycle Battery
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 11 hrs 17 mins
body.description: YT12B-BS High Performance - Maintenance Free - Sealed AGM Motorcycle BatteryYT12B-BS sealed AGM batteries by Chrome Battery are constructed with lead calcium alloy and absorbed glass mat technology that allows for a completely maintenance-free and high-performance operation. All YT12B-BS Chrome Battery brand AGM batteries are manufactured with the highest quality materials and rigorously tested to ensure safety, OEM compatibility, effectiveness and optimal performance. YT12B-BS Battery Features: No spills, no leaks, and no water to check Patented sealed post prevents corrosion which gives extended battery life Extreme vibration resistance to ensure maximum conductivity High Cranking Amps & Low Self-Discharge Rate Ready for Immediate UseYT12B-BS Battery Specifications: Model: YT12B-BSDimensions : (H) 5. 12" x (L) 5. 91" (W) 2. 72"Weight: 8. 46 lbs. CCA: 210Volts: 12VPolarity: [+ -]Terminal Type: Nut & Bolt (T3)Condition: New Also Replaces: mtx12b-bs, yt12b-bs, etx12b-bs, gtx12b-bs, utx12b-bs, ptx12b-bs. Fitment Continued from Bullet Point 5: ring, Sport 1100S 2009, 1100CC Hypermotard 2007-2013, 796CC Hypermotard 2010-2013, 937CC Hypermotard 939 2016-2018, 937CC Hypermotard 939, 950 2016-2019, 937CC Hypermotard 939, 950 2016-2020, 937CC Hyperstrada 939 2016-2018, 937CC Hyperstrada 939 2016-2020, 821CC Monster 2014-2018, 1100CC Monster 1100 2009-2013, 1200CC Monster 1200 2014-2018, 1200CC Monster 1200 2014-2019, 1200CC Monster 1200 2014-2020, 696CC Monster 696 2008-2013, 796CC Monster 796 2010-2013, 803CC Monster 797 2017-2018, 1000CC Monster S2R 2005-2007, 1100CC Multistrada 2007-2009, 1200CC Multistrada 2010-2018, 1200CC Multistrada 2010-2019, 1200CC Multistrada 2010-2020, 1262CC Multistrada 1260 2018, 1262CC Multistrada 1260 2018-2019, 1262CC Multistrada 1260 2018-2020, 937CC Multistrada 950 2017-2018, 937CC Multistrada 950 2017-2019, 937CC Multistrada 950 2017-2020, 803CC Scrambler 2015-2016, 399CC Scrambler Sixty2 2016, 944CC Sport Touring 2 (ST2) 2001-2003, 848CC Street Fighter 2013, 848CC Street Fighter 2013-2015, 1100CC Street Fighter, S 2009-2012, 937CC SuperSport 2017-2019, 937CC SuperSport 2017-2020, 1098CC Various All other models 2001-2010; Kawasaki 1000CC ZX1000-C Ninja ZX-10R 2004-2010; Triumph 865CC America 2001-2013, 865CC Bonneville, T100, SE, FI 2008-2010, 865CC Bonneville, T100, SE, FI 2011-2016, 865CC Scrambler 2008-2010, 865CC Speedmaster 2003-2015, 865CC Thruxton 2009-2013, 1050CC Tiger 2007-2011, 1050CC Tiger 2007-2012; Yamaha 600CC FZ6, R 2005-2017, 650CC XVS650 V-Star (All) 1998-2016, 1000CC YZF-R1 1998-2003, 1000CC YZF-R1 1999-2003, 600CC YZF-R6 1999-2000 Piaggio-Vespa 946CC Vespa 946 2013-2016

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #18,367 in Automotive (See Top 100 in Automotive) #54 in Powersports Batteries

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars As advertised. True to description.
reviews.reviewText: This battery is an exact fit for my 2009 yamaha vstar 650 Silverado. It came new and undamaged and fully charged as advertised. Powerful and easy to install. Fit is exact for aforementioned make and model. Why spend more ? It easily cranks the bike.I had the same understandable concerns that others would have. I had never mail ordered a battery before. I have always bought them in person before. I thought " will they sit it on concrete somewhere in the shipping process? " and " will it be cracked when I get it?" and " will it really be fully charged ?" I know these are the same questions others have and will have.I can say in my case that they must not have set it on concrete. It was not damaged in shipping. It did come fully charged. 5 stars categorically. It came quickly as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My V star loves it so do I
reviews.reviewText: I got a great buy on a low mileage (3,000 miles) 13 year old motorcycle. The P.O. said it had a new battery, but the bike couldn't be started because the gas was leaking out of the carbs all over the engine. I bought it anyway. Well the battery was toast, it may have been new but that was probably a long time ago. About a dollars worth of O rings in the needle valve seats fixed the carbs. This battery brought it back to life. There is nothing better than an old new motorcycle with a new battery. Starts instantly and runs flawlessly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great battery and great price
reviews.reviewText: I used this battery for my 2009 Ducati monster and it works great battery usually last about a year and a half to 2 years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Long lasting & very light weight
reviews.reviewText: A couple of years ago I replaced the battery in child's Power wheel Jeep, and this lithium battery probably doubled the range, I never found out as we wore out before the battery. Now I am using it to power an underwater light for gig fishing, easy to carry cuz so lite, and runs forever. Excellent buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do not buy…dead…can’t return
reviews.reviewText: Did it once and it failed after a week. Did it again and it lasted 3 days… dead. Hassle to return.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was a bit worried since the pricing was so attractive but so far the battery is working well in my triumph bike. Granted, i’ve only had it for a month so time will tell

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for FZ6
reviews.reviewText: It’s a perfect fit and starts the bike right up. 5 stars for the price and for starting the motorcycle over and over super quick with no problems.Here’s why it’s so cheap: the battery terminals aren’t threaded so the screw doesn’t go directly in. The terminals have regular clearance holes and they provide a nut that goes under the terminal for the screws to go into. Not a problem but just be careful not to drop one of those nuts before you screw the battery terminals back on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great warranty for a motorcycle batter and excellent price
reviews.reviewText: I installed the battery after charging it fully. It turned over in a flash. I highly recommend this battery.

reviews.reviewTitle: Schnelle Lieferung, Batterie passt und funktioniert
reviews.reviewText: Schnelle Lieferung, Batterie passt und funktioniert, guter Preis. Wie lange die batterie hält, muss man noch abwarten. Zu diesem Zeitpunkt (4 wochen nach Einbau) gibt es nichts zu bemängeln
Producto de muy buena calidad y precio. Capacidad de carga superior al resto de los productos equivalentes de la competencia. Muy recomendable..

reviews.reviewTitle: La batería dura tres meses y luego muere, no se puede ni recargar.
reviews.reviewText: La batería dura tres meses, luego muere, no intentes recargarla que no se puede, y el plazo para reclamar son tres meses. Espero tener más suerte la próxima vez que compre una xq ni en calleja me la venden cargada.
